introduction: My student spirit is a slice-of-life mystery drama that takes place in Moscow, Russia and follows two students - Dmitry Bratsky and Elijah Douchnov - in very unusual circumstances. Elijah is a ghost of a straight-A student, tied to the dormitory, unable to move on, as "his" room keeps being offered to new students, one of which ends up being Dmitry Bratsky - a party-loving, ordinary Russian tough guy. He learns of Elijah's existence and, despite the clash of characters, they both have to work together to ensure Dmitry doesn't get expelled and Elijah finds peace.
